sourcesContent:
Welcome to home Route

Is Authenticated: {{ isAuthenticated$|async }}
userData
Configuration loaded: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../app.module'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { isAuthenticated = false; user: any; constructor(private _authService: AuthService) {} ngOnInit() { this.isAuthenticated = this._authService.isAuthenticated; } login() { this._authService.login(); } refreshSession() { } logout() { } logoffAndRevokeTokens() { } revokeRefreshToken() { } revokeAccessToken() { } }
